item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Care Bears: Adventures in Care a Lot (2007-2009) (Complete Series) (HQ)
item.description:
Hello. I am new here. By the way, does somebody have the entirety of the Care Bears: Adventures in Care-a-Lot show in HQ? For some ungodly reason, I can't seem to find the entire show for free anywhere online. From what I've gathered, iTunes and Google Play seem to have all of the episodes except for episodes 12-15 of Season 2 which are exclusive to the Grizzly Adventures and Ups and Downs DVD releases respectively: https://tv.apple.com/us/show/care-bears-adventures-in-care-a-lot/umc.cmc.33fizbsfag031ql69t2y0ci6l
https://play.google.com/store/tv/show/Care_Bears_Adventures_In_Care_A_Lot

However, thankfully, all 28 episodes (including the aforementioned Season 2 episodes missing from iTunes and Google Play) have been released on DVD though:
https://carebears.fandom.com/wiki/Grizzle-ly_Adventures
https://carebears.fandom.com/wiki/Ups_and_Downs
https://carebears.fandom.com/wiki/Cheer,_There_and_Everywhere_(DVD)
https://carebears.fandom.com/wiki/Tell-Tale_Tummies
https://carebears.fandom.com/wiki/Bear_Buddies
https://carebears.fandom.com/wiki/Helping_Hearts
https://carebears.fandom.com/wiki/Share-A-Lot_in_Care-A-Lot
https://carebears.fandom.com/wiki/Flower_Power_(DVD)

So, if somebody owns all those DVD volumes, then please rip the episodes from them. It's such a darn shame really that Care Bears: Adventures in Care-a-Lot is so hard to find it in its entirety nowadays because I personally find it to be a hidden gem of a show.
item.author: Astolfcool2001
